mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID as "boardId" , BOARD_TYPE as "boardType" , TITLE as "title" , CONTENTS as "contents" , USER_ID as "userId" , REG_DATE as "regDate" , UPT_DATE as "uptDate" , LIKES as "likes" , COUNTS as "counts" FROM BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_TYPE , TITLE , CONTENTS , USER_ID , REG_DATE , UPT_DATE , LIKES , COUNTS) VALUES(#{boardType} , #{title} ,#{contents} ,#{userId} , now() , now() , 0 , 0)
